text: 11:25 Ua Me Ini 24:6-8; Jeremaia 31:31-34; Sekaraia 9:11; Hibru 8:8-13Me amegha gɨvazɨ, a wain apir kap inigha, kamaghɨram ami. A kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Wain apir kavɨn kam, an Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavir Igiam, kɨ uan ghuzimɨn a gamua gavgavim a ganɨdi. Ia anemamin dughiamɨn, ia anemɨva na gɨnɨghnɨgh.”
